summary: Two small time drug-dealers cross paths with a female-assassin, a monster hunter, a Japanese swordsman and even the Devil himself at a gentlemen's club housing murderous she-demons.
cast: Kelly Hu|Devon Sawa|Ken Foree|Steven Schub|Karen Maxwell|Dawn Olivieri|Ken Ohara|Melissa Barker|Every Heart|Jacki R. Chan|Eva-Maria Leonardou|Sarah Long|Robbyn Leigh|Robbin Ryan
title: Devil's Den
